content: this pattern can be found for free on emsfiberarts com along with a photo tutorial if you d like the ad-free pdf version of this pattern you can purchase it here on ravelry the easy corner to corner baby blanket is a simple corner to corner crochet square with a chain loop border this blanket is soft snuggly and makes a beautiful keepsake gift for a baby shower with a simple shape and an easy-to-memorize pattern this blanket is a great project to curl up on the couch with and works up quickly this pattern uses approx 2 skeins of lion brand ice cream estimated at about 725 yards or so and approx 150 yards of caron one pound you can substitute any comparable light 3 and worsted 4 weight yarn for this project as for gauge my double_crochet blocks were consistently 5/8ths of an inch tall but if you re not concerned about sizing you don t have to worry about gauge your finished blanket may come out bigger or smaller than the measurements i gave if your blocks are a different size if you crochet tightly you may want to adjust your hook size blog emsfiberarts com instagram instagram com/emsfiberarts pinterest pinterest com/emsfiberarts tumblr emsfiberarts tumblr com
